這本$(item)經驗典籍$() 可讓你安全的儲存經驗質
 $(br2)Shift + 右鍵 儲存一個等級。 
右鍵 retrieves a level。
長按右鍵 儲存/ retrive 多個等級。

As you have the $(thing)Curios API$() installed, you can equip the $(item)Tome of Peritia$() as a charm. If you want to wear more curios at once, consider using a $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/sigil/holding)Sigil of Holding$(), or the $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/living_equipment/armor_upgrades/curios_sockets)Socketed Upgrade$() for your $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/living_equipment/living_basics)Living Armour$().
